# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = ""
    words = split(text)
    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            lines *= "\n" * current_line
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= " " * word
    end
    return lines * (current_line != "" ? current_line : "")
end
```

Example:

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")  # Output should be: "This function\nwill wrap words\ninto lines"
```
